data.title: San Antonio Luxury Resort
data.meta_description: Experience luxury at La Cantera Resort & Spa in Texas Hill Country in San Antonio, complete with a relaxing spa, award-winning golf courses & event venues.
data.text:
our concierge

Explore experiences to elevate your stay

Your Resort Les Clefs d’OR Concierge, John and Joan, eagerly await the opportunity to curate your stay to make it uniquely yours. Be adventurous, find hidden gems, and immerse yourself in the most remarkable moments. We cater to a wide range of budgets to make your experience unforgettable.

RANDY ROGERS AND HIS TEXAS FRIENDS

TIP OF THE HAT TO TEXAS

Join us for an unforgettable weekend at La Cantera Resort & Spa for “Tip of the Hat to Texas,” a celebration of country music featuring Randy Rogers and his talented Texas friends. From October 2-4, immerse yourself in the heart of Texas’ vibrant music scene at our singer-songwriter and country music festival.

Experience live performances from some of the Lone Star State’s finest artists, all set against the stunning backdrop of our luxurious resort. Save the date and get ready for an incredible event filled with authentic Texas charm, captivating music, and unforgettable memories.

A Summer Series

Evenings At Topaz

Evenings at TOPAZ is an event that celebrates the simple pleasures in life; a beautiful sunset amongst the hills, the company of friends, delicious and adventurous tastes, allowing life to slow down…or liven up to the music.

Guests will enter the pool deck through their own special event entrance location adjacent to Topaz. There they will check-in on our intimate El Fortin event lawn and enjoy a complimentary cocktail upon arrival.

From there guests can make their way to TOPAZ, La Cantera Resort & Spas exclusive Adult-only pool featuring unrivaled Hill Country views, expansive infinity pool, 10 luxurious cabanas, fully-staffed bar and food offerings.

Things To Do

SUMMER AT LA CANTERA

Welcome to Summer at La Cantera Resort & Spa, where fun and relaxation await families amidst the beauty of the Texas Hill Country! With a wide array of family-friendly activities and amenities, our resort is the perfect destination for creating cherished memories together. Let your little ones unleash their imagination at our supervised kids’ club, where crafts, games, and adventures abound.

When families aren’t cooling off in the pool, they can be playing games in the arcade or taking the resort shuttle to Six Flags. Discover all of the activities that have made La Cantera Resort one of the best family destinations in Texas.

A Monthly Series

Women & Whiskey With a Twist

Experience Women & Whiskey with a twist! Indulge in the elegance of themed nights and discover unique alcohol vendors waiting to delight you each month. Relish the exquisite tastings and perfectly paired bites, embracing a carefully curated selection of premium spirits. Let us elevate your evenings amidst luxury, offering you the chance to immerse yourself in the world of refined beverages within our opulent setting. Join us for unforgettable moments every visit!

AUGUST ADVENTURES

KIDS ACTIVITIES

Discover endless fun for the whole family at La Cantera Resort and Spa! From our engaging Kids Club offering a variety of activities to keep little ones entertained, to creative adventures like building bears at our Bear Factory and crafting vibrant tie-dye shirts, there’s something for every child’s imagination to flourish. Cheer on rubber ducks in our duck races, enjoy cozy family movie nights and bingo, indulge in complimentary s’mores by the fire, and let the kids unleash their inner gamers in our arcade. Make unforgettable memories together at La Cantera Resort and Spa!
